item.title: More Details Emerge About A TikTok Deal Including Oracle Involvement
item.description: Rumors are flying fast and free lately about who might be involved in a potential deal to save TikTok. Now we know more details.

item.title: Why Does Cleo From ‘Tulsa King’ Season 3 Look So Familiar?
item.description: Sylvester Stallone’s "Tulsa King" Season 3 introduces a new character, Cleo Montague, played by Bella Heathcote. What else has Heathcote starred in?

item.title: Earthquake Shakes San Francisco Bay Area
item.description: Early Monday morning, a magnitude 4.3 earthquake with its epicenter centered near Berkeley shook the entire Bay Area, according to USGS.

item.title: As GLP-1 Drugs Take Off, Walmart Expands Specialty Pharmacy Delivery
